Task.Param: people= SELECT stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER AS ufid, stu1.UF_NAME_TXT AS busName, stu1.UF_EMAIL AS email, stu2phone.UF_AREA_CD AS phone_area, stu2phone.UF_PHONE_NO AS phone_num, stu2fax.UF_AREA_CD AS fax_area, stu2fax.UF_PHONE_NO AS fax_num, stu4first.UF_NAME_TXT AS fname, stu4last.UF_NAME_TXT AS lname, stu4mid.UF_NAME_TXT AS mname, stu4pre.UF_NAME_TXT AS prename, stu4suf.UF_NAME_TXT AS sufname, stu4full.UF_NAME_TXT AS fullname, glAcct.USERIDALIAS AS gatorlink, ufau.UF_JOB_LONG AS title FROM t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_1 AS stu1 LEFT JOIN t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_2 AS stu2phone ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = stu2phone.UF_UUID AND stu2phone.UF_TYPE_CD = 10 LEFT JOIN t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_2 AS stu2fax ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = stu2fax.UF_UUID AND stu2fax.UF_TYPE_CD = 11 LEFT JOIN t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_4 AS stu4first ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = stu4first.UF_UUID AND stu4first.UF_TYPE_CD = 35 LEFT JOIN t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_4 AS stu4last ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = stu4last.UF_UUID AND stu4last.UF_TYPE_CD = 36 LEFT JOIN t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_4 AS stu4mid ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = stu4mid.UF_UUID AND stu4mid.UF_TYPE_CD = 37 LEFT JOIN t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_4 AS stu4pre ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = stu4pre.UF_UUID AND stu4pre.UF_TYPE_CD = 38 LEFT JOIN t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_4 AS stu4suf ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = stu4suf.UF_UUID AND stu4suf.UF_TYPE_CD = 39 LEFT JOIN t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_4 AS stu4full ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = stu4full.UF_UUID AND stu4full.UF_TYPE_CD = 232 LEFT JOIN t_UF_PA_GL_ACCT AS glAcct ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = glAcct.OPRID LEFT JOIN t_UF_PER_UFAU AS ufau ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = ufau.UF_UUID WHERE stu1.UF_PROTECT_FLG='N' AND stu1.UF_SECURITY_FLG='N' AND stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER LIKE '%8973%'

positions= SELECT stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER AS ufid, stu5.UF_TYPE_CD AS typeCode, stu5.PS_DEPTID AS deptId, stu5.UF_BEGIN_TS AS beginTS, stu1.UF_WORK_TITLE AS workTitle FROM t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_5 AS stu5 INNER JOIN t_UF_DIR_EMP_STU_1 AS stu1 ON stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER = stu5.UF_UUID1 WHERE stu1.UF_PROTECT_FLG='N' AND stu1.UF_SECURITY_FLG='N' AND stu1.UF_IDENTIFIER LIKE '%8973%'
